content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron mine at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill (position 15.5, 70.5) and furnace (position 16.0, 73.0)

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -8.0, -0.5), and steam engine (position -4.5, -0.5)

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 1.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, 1.5)

### Logistic Science Pack Factory at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position 0.5, 0.5)

### Copper mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of electric mining drill (position -46.5, 70.5), inserter (position -46.5, 72.5), and wooden chest (position -46.5, 73.5)

### Power Network
Consists of steam engine (position -4.5, -0.5), small electric poles at various positions, electric mining drill (position -46.5, 70.5), and assembling machine (position 0.5, 0.5)

### Additional Boilers
Consists of boilers at positions (-6.5, 3.0), (-2.5, 4.0), and (-7.5, -3.0)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the source and target entities are adjacent and that there are no obstacles blocking the connection.
- In this case, there were errors connecting offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) to boilers at various positions.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity or water.
- Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.
- In this case, there were errors placing boilers next to offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, 1.5).

### Errors when placing entities at a specific position
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity.
- In this case, there were errors placing boilers at various positions because the target position was occupied or too far away.

### Errors when using undefined variables or attributes
- Ensure that variables and attributes are defined before they are used.
- In this case, there were no new instances of this error.

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before crafting.
- In this case, there were no new instances of this error.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the item to be inserted is available in the inventory and that the entity has available space.
- In this case, there were no new instances of this error.

### Errors when entities are not receiving power
- Ensure that the entities are connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning.
- In this case, there were errors because the electric mining drill, inserter, and assembling machine were not receiving power.

### Errors when entities are not connected to a fluid source
- Ensure that the entities are connected to a fluid source and that the fluid source is functioning.
- In this case, there were errors because the boilers and steam engine were not connected to a fluid source.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
